title: General Atomics acquires electro-optical sensor supplier EO Vista
summary: Defense contractor General Atomics announced Sept. 15 it acquired EO Vista, a supplier of space and airborne electro-optical sensors.

title: Germany signs Artemis Accords
summary: Germany signed the Artemis Accords Sept. 14, adding one of Europe’s largest space powers to a document outlining best practices for sustainable space exploration.

title: Earth observation players seek new capabilities to tackle climate change
summary: The growing need to tackle climate change presents a transformational growth opportunity for the Earth observation industry, executives from an international mix of companies in this market said Sept. 15.

title: NASA Astronaut, Crewmates Reach Space Station for Science Expedition
summary: NASA astronaut Loral O’Hara and two cosmonauts safely arrived at the International Space Station Friday, Sept. 15, bringing its number of residents to 10 for the coming week.

title: Air Force Research Laboratory delays lunar experiment
summary: An experiment the Air Force Research Laboratory planned to launch in 2025 to monitor deep space is being delayed after concluding that the original schedule was too ambitious.

title: NASA to Discuss Optical Communications Demo Riding with Psyche
summary: NASA will host a media teleconference at 1 p.m. EDT on Wednesday, Sept. 20, to discuss the agency’s first test of high-bandwidth optical communications beyond the Moon. The Deep Space Optical Communications (DSOC) technology demonstration is launching aboard the Psyche spacecraft Thursday, Oct. 5.

title: La NASA lanza primera temporada de su pódcast en español
summary: Para celebrar el Mes de la Herencia Hispana, la NASA lanzará nuevo contenido para Universo curioso de la NASA, el primer pódcast en español de la agencia. El martes 19 de septiembre comenzará una temporada de cinco episodios, con nuevos episodios publicados semanalmente.

title: NASA Releases First Season of Spanish-language Podcast
summary: In celebration of Hispanic Heritage Month, NASA is releasing new content for Universo curioso de la NASA, the agency’s first Spanish-language podcast. A five-episode season will start Tuesday, Sept. 19, with new episodes released weekly.

title: NASA Astronaut Tracy C. Dyson Receives Third Space Station Assignment
summary: NASA has assigned astronaut Tracy C. Dyson to her second long-duration mission to the International Space Station as a flight engineer and member of the Expedition 70/71 crew.

title: NASA Astronaut Tracy C. Dyson Receives Second Space Station Assignment
summary: NASA has assigned astronaut Tracy C. Dyson to her second long-duration mission to the International Space Station as a flight engineer and member of the Expedition 70/71 crew.
